屩字的基本解释

屩
juē
草鞋：“蹑屩而见之。”
姓。

屩字的汉语字典释义

[①]［juē］
［《廣韻》居勺切，入藥，見。］
亦作“1”。亦作“鞽2”。
(1)草鞋。
(2)泛指鞋。
(3)谓穿着草鞋。

屩字的康熙字典解释

【寅集上】【尸字部】　屩； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页304第02
【廣韻】【集韻】居勺切【韻會】訖約切，?音腳。【說文】履也。从履省，喬聲。【廣韻】草履也。【增韻】木曰屐，麻曰屩。【史記·范睢傳】虞卿躡屩擔簦，一見趙王，拜爲上卿。　又【正字通】居六切，音菊。【莊子音義】屩以籍鞋下也。又【集韻】通作蹻。【王褒·聖主得賢臣頌】離疏釋蹻。　【集韻】或作繑。亦作鞽、屫。

屩字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
屩字的起名意思

暂无。

hemp sandals
Basic explanation of words
hemp sandals
juē
Straw shoes: "You can see it."
name.
hemp sandals
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [juē]
["Guangyun" cut in a spoon, used as medicine, see. ]
Also called "1". Also known as "鞽 2".
(1) Straw shoes.
(2) Refers to shoes in general.
(3) Said wearing straw sandals.
hemp sandals
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Ji 1] [Department of Corpse Characters] 　屩; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 304 No. 02
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] Ju Shao Cut [Rhyme Meeting] About cut, sound feet. [Said the text] Li also. From the province, Qiao Sheng. [Guang Yun] Straw shoes also. 【Enhanced rhyme】Mu said 屐, Ma said 屩. 【Historical Records·Fan Sui Biography】Yu Qing lied on the shoulders, and when he saw King Zhao, he worshipped Shangqing.　[Zhengzitong] in six cuts, sound chrysanthemum. [Zhuangzi's Sound and Meaning] Qiao Yiji is also under the shoes. Also 【Jiyun】Through the same. 【Wang Bao·The Holy Lord's Ode to the Virtuous Minister】Li Shu releases the scorpion.　【Jiyun】or Zuozhu. Also known as Yun, 屫.
